Israeli war cabinet member Gantz says 'promising early signs' on new hostage dealIsraeli war cabinet member Benny Gantz said on Wednesday there were "promising early signs of progress" on a new deal to release hostages from Gaza amid regional talks to secure a pause in the war. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 17:35:20 GMT VBJ3TQ5XPRLCVH6HX3YL5TRZ3Y https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-war-cabinet-member-gantz-says-promising-early-signs-new-hostage-deal-2024-02-21/Reuters世界中东
Ukraine arrests father-son duo in Lockbit cybercrime bustPolice in Ukraine said on Wednesday they had arrested a father-son duo who belonged to the cybercrime gang Lockbit, which was disrupted by an international law enforcement operation led by Britain's National Crime Agency and the FBI earlier this week. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 17:06:09 GMT YGO6G64YF5O5XJWOAYYVBK5UIA https://www.reuters.com/technology/cybersecurity/ukraine-arrests-father-son-duo-lockbit-cybercrime-bust-2024-02-21/Yuliia Dysa, James Pearson技术网络安全
Victims ask pope for independent inquiry into abuse by prominent priestFormer nuns who said they were subjected to sexual, psychological or spiritual abuse by a famous priest urged Pope Francis on Wednesday to allow an independent investigation, saying the Catholic Church had put up "a rubber wall" blocking the truth. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 16:46:26 GMT A27HVR3VLBP2BEGWS3AA4MJO4Y https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/victims-ask-pope-in​​dependent-inquiry-into-abuse-by-prominent-priest-2024-02-21/Philip Pullella世界欧洲
Israeli rape crisis centres demand UN action over Oct. 7 attacksIsraeli rape crisis centres called on the United Nations and other international bodies on Wednesday to address what they called the "systematic, targeted sexual abuse" of women during the Hamas-led assault on southern Israel on Oct. 7. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 16:43:48 GMT 6CF2XWDKSVP5NDWR5LMZ4LNBQI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-rape-crisis-centres-demand-un-action-over-oct-7-attacks-2024-02-21/Reuters世界中东
Poland moves to summon central bank chief to state tribunal, PAP saysLawmakers from Poland's ruling coalition will submit a preliminary motion to put central bank governor Adam Glapinski before a state tribunal by the end of March, state news agency PAP reported a coalition lawmaker as saying, in what would be an unprecedented move for the European Union state. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 16:14:49 GMT OFOV3SFTQNN2NCOLWLK7SRTFGQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/polish-govt-move-put-central-bank-chief-before-state-tribunal-pap-2024-02-21/Alan Charlish, Pawel Florkiewicz世界欧洲
Anti-drug crusader or cartel secret weapon? Honduras ex-president's trial kicks offA New York jury on Wednesday heard clashing descriptions of former Honduras President Juan Orlando Hernandez as his U.S. drugs trial opened, with prosecutors saying traffickers fueled his rise to power and the defense countering that witnesses were framing him as revenge for his crackdown on cartels. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 15:55:54 GMT KYMRDH4OFVJKJAP2C2HJ2NPM4U https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/ex-honduras-president-worked-hand-hand-with-drug-traffickers-us-says-2024-02-21/Luc Cohen世界美洲
Yandex co-founder Arkady Volozh to be removed from EU Russian sanctions list, sources sayEU countries have agreed to remove Arkady Volozh, co-founder of Russian internet giant Yandex, from their list of sanctioned entities and individuals relating to Russia's war in Ukraine, three sources familiar with the matter said. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 15:47:25 GMT TWUJ3MGMMRPNPJT5JA34EIO3SM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/yandex-co-Founder-arkady-volozh-be-removed-eu- Russian-sanctions-list-sources-say-2024-02-21/Reuters世界欧洲
Ship abandoned in Red Sea faces unknown fate - sourcesA cargo ship abandoned four days ago in the Gulf of Aden after it was hit by missiles fired by Yemen's Houthis is still floating despite taking in water, and could be towed to nearby Djibouti, industry sources said on Wednesday. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 15:38:44 GMT P2KG6W6ZLRJ77LZUIVOHBLPIAQ https://www.reuters.com/world/ship-abandoned-red-sea-faces-unknown-fate-sources-2024-02-21/Jonathan Saul世界
Former Polish PM's failure to apply for EU cash may be crime, says govtPoland's former prime minister may have committed a crime by failing to submit an application for EU funds, according to a motion set to come before parliament, escalating a conflict over alleged wrongdoing by the former administration. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 15:31:10 GMT 5FAKW3M54VIWXOR5OAD7OJV3YM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/former-polish-pms-failure-apply-eu-cash-may-be-crime-says-govt-2024-02-21/Reuters世界欧洲
UKMTO says explosion reported west of Red Sea port of HodeidahThe United Kingdom Maritime Trade Operations (UKMTO) agency said on Wednesday it received reports of an explosion and a flash in the southern Red Sea 40 nautical miles to the west of Yemen's Red Sea port of Hodeidah. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 14:59:09 GMT GYHP6DU6DVPKLPWMMJUIH6ETRE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/ukmto-says-explosion-reported-west-red-sea-port-hodeidah-2024-02-21/Reuters世界中东
Pakistan in for 'roller coaster' ride after parties strike dealThe deal between two Pakistani parties to form a coalition government will be based on conditional support from one of them, the Pakistan People's Party, that will review decisions on a case-by-case basis, a top PPP official said on Wednesday. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 14:57:36 GMT YDUZ4X57HJOQPLR25NVELLCRIM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/pakistan-roller-coaster-ride-after-parties-strike-deal-2024-02-21/Asif Shahzad, Ariba Shahid世界亚太地区
